item.title: Springsteen’s Quisling Concert
item.description: Borrowed politics defeat a former rock-music hero.

item.title: The Left Will Never Recover from Donald Trump
item.description: Trump has shifted the Overton window in the culture away from woke, and it’s hard to imagine it shifting all the way back.

item.title: Trump’s Ominous Threat to Apple
item.description: The president of the United States is not a king whose words carry the power of law, yet businessmen have found it smart to act as though they do.

item.title: The Clock Is Running Out for Covid Fraud Investigations
item.description: A bill to allow more time to track down and file charges for these massive fraud schemes is languishing in the Senate.

item.title: Big and Beautiful: The House Defunds Planned Parenthood
item.description: A major milestone for pro-lifers looms if the Senate passes the House version of the One Big Beautiful Bill.
